verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> [Tmas-KilMaschil לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach. of Korah כְּאַיָּ֗ל <S%H354><s%> ke-'ai-Yal, As the hart תַּעֲרֹ֥ג <S%H6165><s%> ta-'a-Rog panteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אֲפִֽיקֵי־ <S%H650><s%> 'a-fi-kei- brooks מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; after the water כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So נַפְשִׁ֨י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul תַעֲרֹ֖ג <S%H6165><s%> ta-'a-Rog so panteth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. after thee O God

צָמְאָ֬ה <S%H6770><s%> tza-me-'Ah thirsteth נַפְשִׁ֨י׀ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi My soul לֵאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him for God לְאֵ֪ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El God חָ֥י <S%H2416><s%> chai for the living מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai When אָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> a-Vo; when shall I come וְ֝אֵרָאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-'e-ra-'Eh, and appear פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

הָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-tah- have been לִּ֬י li דִמְעָתִ֣י <S%H1832><s%> dim-'a-Ti My tears לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem have been my meat יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam day וָלָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> va-La-ye-lah; and night בֶּאֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> be-'e-Mor say אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, while they continually אַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. angels

אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These אֶזְכְּרָ֨ה׀ <S%H2142><s%> 'ez-ke-Rah When I remember וְאֶשְׁפְּכָ֬ה <S%H8210><s%> ve-'esh-pe-Chah these [things] I pour out עָלַ֨י׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my soul כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֶֽעֱבֹ֨ר׀ <S%H5674><s%> 'e-'e-Vor in me for I had gone בַּסָּךְ֮ <S%H5519><s%> bas-soCh with the multitude אֶדַּדֵּ֗ם <S%H1718><s%> 'ed-dad-Dem, I went עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit with them to the house אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God בְּקוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> be-kol- with the voice רִנָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah of joy וְתוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> ve-to-Dah, and praise הָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon with a multitude חוֹגֵֽג׃ <S%H2287><s%> cho-Geg. that kept holyday

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ <S%H7817><s%> tish-To-cha-Chi Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi any וַתֶּהֱמִ֪י <S%H1993><s%> vat-te-he-Mi disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <S%H3176><s%> ho-Chi-li in me;hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-him thou in God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od shall again אוֹדֶ֗נּוּ <S%H3034><s%> o-Den-nu, for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'ot him [for] the help פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav. of his countenance

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Hai, O my God עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִׁ֪י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul תִשְׁתּ֫וֹחָ֥ח <S%H7817><s%> tish-To-Chach is cast down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- within כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that אֶ֭זְכָּרְךָ <S%H2142><s%> 'Ez-ka-re-cha within me therefore will I remember מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz thee from the land יַרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> yar-Den; of Jordan וְ֝חֶרְמוֹנִ֗ים <S%H2769><s%> ve-cher-mo-Nim, and of the Hermonites מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har from the hill מִצְעָֽר׃ <S%H4706><s%> mitz-'Ar. Mizar תְּהֽוֹם־ <S%H8415><s%> te-hom- confusion אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about

תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> te-Hom Deep ק֭וֹרֵא <S%H7121><s%> Ko-re calleth לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> le-Kol at the noise צִנּוֹרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6794><s%> tzin-no-Rei-cha; of thy waterspouts כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <S%H4867><s%> mish-ba-Rei-cha all thy waves וְ֝גַלֶּ֗יךָ <S%H1530><s%> ve-gal-Lei-cha, and thy billows עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Va-ru. are gone

יוֹמָ֤ם׀ <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam in the daytime יְצַוֶּ֬ה <S%H6680><s%> ye-tzav-Veh will command יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [Yet] the LORD חַסְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do, his lovingkindness וּ֭בַלַּיְלָה <S%H3915><s%> U-val-lay-lah and in the night; שִׁירָהּ shi-rah כשִׁירֹ֣ו <S%H7892><s%> shi-Ro musical קעִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi; with תְּ֝פִלָּ֗ה <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah, [shall be] with me [and] my prayer לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El unto the God חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai. of my life

אוֹמְרָ֤ה׀ <S%H559><s%> 'om-Rah I will say לְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El unto God סַלְעִי֮ <S%H5553><s%> sal-'I my rock לָמָ֪ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah Why שְׁכַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <S%H7911><s%> she-Chach-Ta-ni Why hast thou forgotten לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> lam-mah- Why קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> ko-Der I mourning אֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech, go בְּלַ֣חַץ <S%H3906><s%> be-La-chatz because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> o-Yev. of the enemy

בְּרֶ֤צַח׀ <S%H7524><s%> be-Re-tzach [As] with a sword בְּֽעַצְמוֹתַ֗י <S%H6106><s%> be-'atz-mo-Tai, in my bones חֵרְפ֥וּנִי <S%H2778><s%> che-re-Fu-ni reproach צוֹרְרָ֑י <S%H6887><s%> tzor-Rai; mine enemies בְּאָמְרָ֥ם <S%H559><s%> be-'a-me-Ram me while they say אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, daily אַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. angels
